text: Experienced crossbowmen who have guarded the walls of the capital for generations.
Castle Crossbowmen
Also known as the Golden Cloaks, these officers have earned their honorable status through courageous deeds and fearless hearts.
Praetorians
Elite infantry who can effectively withstand enemy charges, creating opportunities for other units to defeat the enemy.
Royal Guards
Trained and powerful beasts that aid the Bretonnians in battle.
Royal Hippogryphs
Cavalry who have accepted a sacred mission as the elite Sun Knights.
Knights of the Radiant Order
Cavalry who have accepted a sacred mission as the elite Sun Knights.
Knights of the Radiant Order
The Paladins are the elite troops and ultimate defenders of Bretonnia.
Paladins
The Inquisitors are faithful upholders of the doctrines of the Dragon of Light, Elrath.
Inquisitors
Guided by higher powers, Zealots use their staff weapons to whip those heretics.
Zealots
Angels are the humanoid manifestations of the Dragon of Light, Elrath, and the ultimate embodiment of its power.
Angels
Among the holy ranks of the Dragon of Light's servants, Archangels are the highest beings.
Archangels
They roam throughout Bretonnia in the name of the Lake of the Lake, monitoring and judging various injustices.
Magistrates
